elements.name: Verify whether User is able to access  -  VMS Application MSP User

steps.name: Enter application URL in address bar
Enter Username
Enter Password
Click Sing_In
In Dashboard, click the Setting Icon in the top right hand corner
User can Add New Widget, Save dashboard configuration, empty dashboard and close editing

elements.name: View and Adjust User Settings MSP User

steps.name: In Dashboard, click user icon picture in bottom left corner; a flyout window will open and click on ""Account Settings""
User can change specific items on user, including user photo
If changes made, click ""Save"""

elements.name: Add Job in system MSP User

steps.name: Click the second icon on the left navigation panel
A flyout window will appear. Click on ""Create Job""
On the job template field, enter the job title or look for the desired job title under "Recent Job Templates" or "Popular Job Templates"
Select the job manager - work location will be auto populated; continue to select program industry
Click on "Continue" button"

elements.name: Add Job in system MSP User

steps.name: In second page of Add Job, selected the estimated started and end dates of the Job,number of positions, expense allowed, Currency, Unit of Measure, Min and Max Bill Rate, and Over time exempt
Post entry, scroll down to end of page to view the budget
Click "view detailed estimate" to view the components that add up to create the budget; change details as needed
Click "Continue"

elements.name: Add Job in system MSP User

steps.name: The foundational data will be defaulted based on the selection made . Click each field to make changes if necessary
Click "Submit" to create the job

elements.name: View Job Workflow on Job Requisition MSP User

steps.name: Once submitted, the user will be shown the details of the job created
Click on the approvals tab on the job detatils page to view the approval workflow
You should see the first level of approval as the Hiring Manager and the second level of approval as HM+1"

elements.name: Approve Step 1 of Job Requisition Client User/HM

steps.name: Login as Hiring manager using the credentials for the Hiring Manager
From the dashboard under pending actions widget, click on jobs pending approval
Select the job created and either click on the approval tab or on the Pending approval button on the top right corner of the screen.
Click on approve

elements.name: Approve Step 2 of Job Requisition Client User/HM

steps.name: Login as Hiring manager+1 using the credentials for the Hiring Manager+1
From the dashboard under pending actions widget, click on jobs pending approval
Select the job created and either click on the approval tab or on the Pending approval button on the top right corner of the screen.
Click on approve

elements.name: Release Job to supplier/s MSP User

steps.name: Log back in as the MSP User, click on the briefcase icon on the left navigation panel and from the flyout window select View All jobs
Click on the Job title of the Job you're working on
Job Details should open and you will find an actions button on the top right corner of the screen;
select Distribute
This will bring the user to the distribute tab and the user can type to search the vendors
Once added, Click on Enbale Submission Limit toggle to set it ON or OFF
Click on Distribute

elements.name: Create and Submit Candidate as Vendor

steps.name: Login as Supplier to which job was distributed
In the user's dashboard, from "Pending Actions" widgets click on "New Job Requests"
This will open Jobs needing submittal
Click on the job you created; this will redirect you to "Job Details" Section
Click on the actions button on the top right corner and select
add & submit candidate to create and submit candidate
Submit candidate to select candidates from the list of available candidates
Fill in the necessary details and click on submit candidate

elements.name: Shortlist candidate/s as Program MSP user

steps.name: Login as the MSP user

In Pending Actions click on Resumes to Review. Alternatively, navigate to the job from the left navigation pane and click on the job you are working on. You should be able to see a tab named Submitted Candidates
This will bring up list of all submitted candidates. You can either review each one by clicking the Candidate's name
Review the candidate details. Click on "Reject" to review Rejection reasons in module; for this exercise, click "Shortlist"
On the candidate details page, after reviewing the candidate - click on Schedule Interview on the right side of the page
This will redirect to the schedule interview page.
Fill in the relevant details and click on schedule interview
Login as the Vendor of the candidate Accept Interview
click the pending action
Select the candidate you were working on and click on the candidates name
Accept_button
interview_and_select_Accept

elements.name: Create Offer for Candidate MSP user

steps.name: Navigate to the job from the left navigation pane and click on the job you are working on
This will bring up list of all submitted candidatesYou can either review each one by clicking the Candidate's name
Click on the candidate you wish to create offer for and head to offers tab in the candidates detail page
Fill in all the relevant details

elements.name: Accept Offer as Supplier Client Vendor

steps.name: Log in as Supplier you are using
Click on Pending Offers under Pending Actions

steps.name: Click on Candidate name for whom the offer was created in step 15
Click on Reject Offer or click Accept Offer
Log in as Hiring Manager
Click Timesheet Pending Approval under Pending Actions
You can open up the Timesheet and view details of the timesheet and click on approve
Log in as Worker Vendor
Click on the second icon clock icon on the eft navigation pane and click on View General Expenses
Click on the blue + icon near the Expense list
Select the assignment you wish to add the expense for and click Continue
Click on Add expense
Select the Day for the Expense, Expense Type, Amount, and Receipt attachment - click Add Expense
You can add more expenses for the Expense Sheet by clicking Add Expense. Once you are finished, click Submit for Approval
Log in as MSP User or Vendor
Msp View General Expenses
Open an Expense that is pending for approval and Withdrawn
You can adjust the Expense entered then select the Reasons for Modification and click
